notable_shifts.description: 'ai product development' is a newer topic, first appearing in 2024-Q2 with 5 total episodes
'product market fit' has declined: 7 episodes in first half → 3 in second half
'product led growth' has declined: 8 episodes in first half → 2 in second half
'startup scaling' has declined: 6 episodes in first half → 2 in second half
'decision making frameworks' has declined: 6 episodes in first half → 1 in second half

'company culture' has declined: 4 episodes in first half → 1 in second half
'first principles thinking' has declined: 3 episodes in first half → 1 in second half
'product management' is a consistent topic, appearing in 10/13 quarters (25 total episodes)
